prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a smooth, rounded body and unique spiral patterns.
Imagine a playful aquatic creature that loves to swim and splash in ponds.
Show me a small, blue Pokemon that has a distinct tail and large expressive eyes.
Design a cute, round water Pokemon with fins and a cheerful disposition.
Generate a Pokemon that thrives in wetlands, featuring a sleek body and charming face.
Give me a quirky aquatic creature with a spiral belly and energetic personality.
Make a whimsical water Pokemon that can easily blend into its watery habitat.
